alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Lee; Macon; Russell; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:43PM CDT until June 25 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in east central Alabama... Macon County in southeastern Alabama... Tallapoosa County in east central Alabama... Southwestern Chambers County in east central Alabama... Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Kellyton to near Columbus, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Phenix City, Opelika, Alexander City, Tuskegee, Tallassee, Dadeville, Camp Hill, Notasulga, Hurtsboro, Smiths, Smiths Station, Jacksons` Gap, Franklin, Waverly, Cusseta, Martin Dam, Beulah, Lake Tuskegee and Tuskegee National Forest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
